resources.string: Reset color values to\nAndroid- or DarkKat default?
Reset values to\nAndroid- or DarkKat default?
Enable, to show the custom carrier label
Enable, to show the Wifi network name
Enable, to show the battery status ring dotted
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options.

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s To add a longclick action, hold the row.

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.

Click the info icon to show this help text again
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
The chosen action cannot be added twice
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Press on color below to apply
Customize the root list of the settings
Enable to show mobile network settings at the rootlist, disable to show mobile network settings at the wireless settings.
Enable to colorize the account icons, too.
Enable to show the content behind the lock screen. Your data may be visible to those around you
See through needs to be disabled
Show slider lockscreen before secure unlock mechanism
You are using an unsecure method to unlock
View or change the slider targets
Enable eight custom lock screen targets.
Changing this option resets your current lockscreen targets setup to default.
\n\nWith eight lockscreen targets enabled you cannot use your lockscreen shortcuts at the same time.
Enable, to colorize the targets icons
Enable, to colorize a custom lock icon, too
Double-tap and hold the slider to start torch
Drag the slider to targets to assign applications
Lock screen targets reset to default
Delete all user created lock screen targets and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon
Enable, to Show the battery status ring around lock ring
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Enable, to use additional available widgets instead of the default one
Enable, to use home screen widgets on the lockscreen, too
Show widgets maximized and the unlock minimized when the screen is turned on
Enable, to show the widgets carousel
Enable, to hide the widgets background frame
Enable, to show the battery status when the charger is unplugged, too
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Enable to show the clock in the status bar
Enable to show the date next to the clock in the status bar
Enabe to show the clock (& date) centered in the status bar
Enabe to display the date small sized
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable to show the battery status in the status bar
Activate, to show the battery status text
Enable to show a mini icon instead of the default Android big icon
Activate, to show the battery status percentage sign
If disabled, the battery status color with a transparency of 80% will be used.
Enable to use a custom text color for the battery status at 90 percent or more. Disable to use green color.
Enable to show the battery bar
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Enable to show the network activity indicator
Enable, to activate the network speed indicator
Enable, to show an indicator icon
Enable to show the values in bit instead of byte
Enable to hide the indicator if there is no traffic
Enable to colorize the notification icons color
Display the number of pending notifications
Enable, to always show the settings button
Activate, to show a small version of the quick settings on the notification area
Quick settings deactivated, activate the quick settings to use the quick access ribbon
Activate, to use the same tiles and layout as the Quick Settings panel

"Obtaining location from network is currently disabled. This breaks the ability to get the current weather in your current location. Please set a custom location or enable obtaining your location from your network."
Whether to pull weather information and display it throughout the ROM.
Setting a custom location can save some battery. Otherwise GPS-/network-location is used to determine your location.

Be sure to follow the examples! Setting an invalid location will stop you from getting weather updates and may cause unexpected behavior.\n\nExamples: New York,NY // New York, NY // 10033 // London, England
Unable to retrieve location information for weather update
Enable to show the refresh timestamp
Disable to colorize the monochrome icons only
Enable, to use own network activity icon colors for mobile and wifi tiles
Enable, to use own network activity icon colors for wifi tiles
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
Reset displayed tiles and layout to default?
All tiles were removed. Quick settings are disabled.\n\nTo enable add a tile.

To add a quick settings tile, press the Add button and choose the tile you would like. To rearrange your tiles, longpress the tile and drag it into the position you want. If you want to delete a tile, drag it to the delete button which appears while dragging the tile.

To setup dynamic tiles press the respective icon on the top right of the screen

To disable quick settings completely, remove all tiles

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.

Click the info icon to show this help text again.

To add a tile, press the Add button and choose the tile you would like. To rearrange your tiles, longpress the tile and drag it into the position you want. If you want to delete a tile, drag it to the delete button which appears while dragging the tile.

To disable quick access ribbons completely, remove all tiles.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.

Click the info icon to show this help text again
Enable to show the navigation bar on the bottom,\ndisable to show the navigation bar on the on the right side
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Enable for Slim Recents,\ndisable for Android Recents
Activate, to show screenshot option in Power Menu
Activate, to show screen record option in Power Menu
Activate, to show immersive mode option in Power Menu
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
This rambar shows how android is really using your available ram. Please note that having apps open in the background and cached helps for your device to open your apps faster.
Select a bootanimation zip from sdcard.
No application found to pick the zip file. Please install a file manager.
Enable to play the bootanimation preview looped

The rom doesn`t contains additional bootanimations, the bootanimation has to be stored on the sd-card

The bootaniamtion has to be in bootanimation zip format, (NOT a flashable zip!)

The current bootanimation will be backed up on every bootanimation installation, this last bootanimation can be restored at any time.
This backup will be overwritten on every new bootanimation installation.

On the first bootanimation installation, there will be a seperate backup of this original bootanimation, this original bootanimation can be restored at any time.

The backups won`t get lost on a rom update, as long as you DON`T use a full-wipe.

The rom contains a backup script which will restore the current bootanimation on a rom update.
Click cancel to dismiss.\nClick Original to restore the original boot animation.\nClick last to restore the last boot animation.
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Enable to show heads up notification always expanded
Enable to show updates from pending background notifications as heads up
If snooze button is pressed disable heads up for %d minutes.
Heads up notification will show up for %d seconds.
Heads up notification will show till it is dismissed.
Enable to use the custom timeout in full screen, too
View or change how the \'cLock\' Home and Lock screen widgets will display
Clear the list of excluded applications?
Configure the hours the device should be quiet
When to start enforcing quiet hours
When to stop enforcing quiet hours
Notification light will function as normal
Haptic feedback will function as normal
This message will be sent to anyone who contacts you while quiet hours are active
[Automated Message] I\'ll get back to you as soon as possible.
If an incoming message contains this text your phone will sound an alarm
" met the requirements to bypass Quiet Hours!"
Notice:\nAs the start volume is set higher than the ringer volume, the ring tone will be played using the ringer volume.
Activate, to show safe headset volume warning
When screen off, long-pressing the volume buttons will switch music tracks
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Turn the screen off to see the selected notification in action or dismiss this dialog to stop the test
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting the charger
Turn the screen on when pressing the volume button up/down
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
You don\'t have any blacklisted numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To blacklist calls and/or messages from certain numbers, enable the blacklist.
Incoming calls and messages from phone numbers in the blacklist will be blocked
Enable, to show notifications about blocked numbers on the statusbar
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Do you want to remove this blacklist entry?
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery or bootloader
"Changing permissions of core Android components might lead to undesired behavior. Change settings here at your own risk!
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Check for, view or install available updates
